name: Pathfinder
description: Discover new things, meet new people, learn new things. The Pathfinder is always looking to the horizon. They're the first to clamber up the mountain, leap across the river, or dash down the slope. The road is their friend and they can't wait to see what's around the corner.
ideals: I addressed challenges with curiosity, exploration, or understanding.
I expressed my heritage, background, or beliefs through my actions.
I saw, heard, or tasted something truly unique.

gear.name: Highland Kit
items: foldable canvas glider that can carry one person

gear.name: Lowland Kit
items: a reliable one or two person mount (horse, dog, arkentech heliobike)

gear.name: Extreme Kit
items: arkentech rebreather (1hr of clean air for water, gas, etc)

secondwind: Regain 1 effort when you enter a new scene. This ability can activate any number of times a session.
specialability: Leading a team action only costs 1 effort for you.
